block_2.title: Why
block_2.copy: This site was born from the need to have an environment free from any dependencies where I can experiment with code and graphics

block_3.title: what
block_3.copy: The project is composed of 3 libraries to manage components and animations, these libraries are designed for personal use but it remains an open-source project. At a graphic level the focus is directed to resume the study of lettering.
